Description:At breakpoint export wizard, I sometimes get errors and unable to export. 
Build date: I20060322-1335
OS: WindowsXP Japanese sp2, IBM JRE 5.0SR1
        Steps to recreate problem:
        1- add a breakpoint at a sentence includes DBCS on a Java program
        2- File > Export, select Breakpoints then hit NEXT button
        
Result:

Created an attachment (id=36980)
DBCS 3.2 Breakpoint Export Problem Log

I have the same problem. My environment is:

Build date: I20060322-1335
OS: SLES 9, IBM JRE 1.4.2

Problem: unable to hit the "Next" button. The error log is attached to this comment.

Fixed in EmbeddedBreakpointsViewer. Had nothing to do with DBCS.

Steps:

* select a file in package explorer
* try "Export...", select breakpoints and press next.

In this case the selection has a file.
